Chronic Kidney Disease Awareness: Ịmara Ọrịa Kọda Nke Dị Mkpọrọ
Learn how to monitor and manage CKD effe: Mụta otu esi lelee ma jikwaa CKD nke ọma. Ahụike gị bụ ihe kachasị mkpa n'ụlọọrụ anyị.
Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) is a condit: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) bụ ọrịa nke na-eme ka ọrụ koda na-ebelata nke ukwuu n’oge. Inyocha ya n'oge na njikwa ya bụ ihe dị mkpa iji zere nsogbu ndị ọzọ. Anyị na-enye ọtụtụ ihe ọmụma iji nyere ndị mmadụ na ndị na-ahụ maka ahụike inweta njikwa nke CKD.
Learn the steps you can take to reduce t: Mụta ihe ị ga-eme iji belata ihe egwu nke CKD, gụnyere inwe ndụ dị mma, ịṅụ mmiri nke ọma, na ịmegharị nyocha oge niile.
Get tools and insights to track kidney h: Nweta ngwaọrụ na nghọta iji soro ahụ ike koda, nyochaa ihe mgbaàmà, na-ahụ maka ọganihu gị niile.
Access detailed information about treatm: Nweta ozi zuru ezu banyere atụmatụ ọgwụgwọ, mgbanwe ndụ, na ntụziaka ndị ọkachamara nke dị mkpa maka mkpa gị.
